title: Undo the most recent change and redeploy

requirements.text: Undo the most recent product change by reverting the final step (Page 5) main heading text in the Valentine proposal flow to exactly: "So Shruti ❤️....".

quotes: undo the step and redeploy it

acceptanceCriteria: In the final step (Page 5), the main heading text is exactly "So Shruti ❤️...." (including punctuation and emoji).
No other user-facing copy changes are introduced as part of this undo.

requirements.text: Redeploy the application after the undo so the live Preview loads successfully without deployment errors.

quotes: undo the step and redeploy it

acceptanceCriteria: A fresh deployment completes successfully (no deployment failure).
The deployed Preview loads and the 5-step Valentine proposal flow is usable end-to-end.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not add new steps, new animations, or additional interactions beyond the undo and redeploy.
Do not add backend features or persistence beyond what already exists.
